Tucson knew deep down that Vestige was a part of Rodimus and that by religh=
ting his spark, would hopefully rekindle the spark in Rodimus as well.  The=
 exchange of energy was mysteriously not taxing on Tucson as it would have =
been if he had transfered his own spark energy into his chest.  This was a =
power that was saved for many years in the hopes that one day, it's energy =
would be needed for a greater purpose.  This was that day.  And as Vestige =
came alive, his heart felt all the more energized as it filled endlessly wi=
th the joy of hope he had for his new friend.  

" I hope never to lose you=
 my friend, you've helped me in more ways than I can describe.  You've give=
n me new found hope that adversity can be overcome, and now I pass on that =
power of hope to you.  We can do this, we will awaken Rodimus and through o=
ur compassion for each other, we may just be able to exterminate this enemy=
 for good."


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Preston Carroll <supercyclonus=
@...> wrote:
>
